sourcesContent:
export const lightTheme = {
  body: "#fafafa",
  primaryColor: "#FF7082",
  secondaryColor: "#A064A0",
  Example: "#db7093",
  text: "#363537",
  toggleBorder: "#A7BEE0",
  gradient:
    "linear-gradient(to top, #030303, #0d0d0d, #141414, #1a1a1a, #202020)",
  background: "#fafafa",
};

export const darkTheme = {
  body: "#333",
  primaryColor: "#606688",
  secondaryColor: "#EAEFFF",
  text: "#FAFAFA",
  toggleBorder: "#F8D027",
  gradient:
    "linear-gradient(to top, #030303, #0d0d0d, #141414, #1a1a1a, #202020)",
  background: "#333",
};
